channel.title: Can't log in =[
channel.description:
i downloaded like 10 clients and can not fully log in. i can log on a server with a webclient but i can't make a webclient(can't figure it out) could any one help me? i didn't edit any thing on any client i got a client that when i sign in it stop's when it show's chat box, all icons, invo, and the black loading - please wait... and black map. like the pic under this [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img516.imageshack.us/img516/8038/problemvv1.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img516/problemvv1.png/1/][IMG]http://img516.imageshack.us/img516/problemvv1.png/1/w769.png[/img][/URL]
that's what it shows what do i do to fix it?! i don't work with clients much.
i noticed that i get an error when i log in when it stop's and looks like the pick ^, the error is down [code]Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:690) at Class46.method578(Class46.java:192) at Class7.method175(Class7.java:616) at Class7.method190(Class7.java:1427) at client.method22(client.java:398) at client.method54(client.java:2405) at client.method53(client.java:2353) at client.method62(client.java:2796) at client.method7(client.java:1865) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:115) at client.run(client.java:4261) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)[/code]
im useing deltascape client v16, and other's it started when i used deltascape client tho... i don't know if this would help but my run.bat code is [code]@echo off title DeltaScape client "D:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe" -cp .;run.bat client" pause[/code]
p.s the xbox thing under picture i don't know how to get rid of it. sorry

item.title: Can't log in =[
item.dc:creator: @omghydro omghydro
item.description:
@omghydro wrote:

im useing a deltascape server, and the client is deltascape.
could any one please help me?

Read full topic

item.title: Can't log in =[
item.dc:creator: @emyy11 emyy11
item.description:
@emyy11 wrote:

[quote=“omghydro, post:1, topic:235101”]i downloaded like 10 clients and can not fully log in.
i can log on a server with a webclient but i can’t make a webclient(can’t figure it out)
could any one help me? i didn’t edit any thing on any client
i got a client that when i sign in it stop’s when it show’s chat box, all icons, invo, and the black loading - please wait… and black map. like the pic under this

that’s what it shows what do i do to fix it?! i don’t work with clients much.

i noticed that i get an error when i log in when it stop’s and looks like the pick ^, the error is down

Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:690) at Class46.method578(Class46.java:192) at Class7.method175(Class7.java:616) at Class7.method190(Class7.java:1427) at client.method22(client.java:398) at client.method54(client.java:2405) at client.method53(client.java:2353) at client.method62(client.java:2796) at client.method7(client.java:1865) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:115) at client.run(client.java:4261) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

im useing deltascape client v16, and other’s it started when i used deltascape client tho…
i don’t know if this would help but my run.bat code is

@echo off title DeltaScape client "D:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe" -cp .;run.bat client" pause

p.s the xbox thing under picture i don’t know how to get rid of it. sorry[/quote] DeltaScape is bugged like crap…you need use delta client -.-

Read full topic
